name: Happier
description: Happier is a self-hostable UI/CLI stack for monitoring and interacting with Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini sessions from a web UI and mobile.

notes.text: The Happier web UI requires HTTPS for remote access (secure context). Use Tailscale Serve or your reverse proxy.
This script installs the upstream Happier stack via npx (@happier-dev/stack). Review sources before installing.

Optional: choose which HStack channel/version to install by setting HAPPIER_PVE_HSTACK_CHANNEL=stable|preview (preview maps to npm dist-tag @next), or HAPPIER_PVE_HSTACK_PACKAGE='@happier-dev/stack@<tag-or-version>'.
